text: Consonantal sound represented by ⟨r̼⟩ in IPA The linguolabial trill is a type of consonantal sound not used in any known languages. The symbol in the International Phonetic Alphabet that represents it is . ==Features== Features of the linguolabial trill: Trill consonant Linguolabial consonant Voiced consonant Oral Category:Linguolabial consonants Category:Pulmonic consonants Category:Trill consonants
title: Linguolabial trill
